lines.text: [upon seeing that his challenger in a duel is a woman]
Guns are for scro's, Ray. Besides, it's a waste of good beer.
If you kill me, someone just like me - or worse - will become my replacement. I am inevitable!
Sure. I got lots of ideas.
I'm going to be a Clipper.
Boy, I told you to go out and find adventure, not bring it home!
